verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* pressed \w olives|strong="H2132"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w keep|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* burning \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

\w Outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \f + \fr 24:3 \ft The Testimony refers to the stone tablets in the ark of the covenant inscribed with the Ten Commandments.\f* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w Aaron|strong="H6186"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* tend \w the|strong="H6440"\w* lamps \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*. \w This|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w permanent|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* come.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* tend \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* gold \w lampstand|strong="H4501"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*. The Showbread (Exodus 25:23–30; Exodus 37:10–16)

\w You|strong="H3947"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* also \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w and|strong="H8147"\w* bake \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w loaves|strong="H2471"\w*, using \w two-tenths|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* ephah \w for|strong="H6241"\w* \w each|strong="H3947"\w* \w loaf|strong="H2471"\w*,\f + \fr 24:5 \ft Two-tenths of an ephah is approximately 4 dry quarts or 4.4 liters (probably about 5.1 pounds or 2.3 kilograms of flour).\f*

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rows|strong="H4634"\w*—\w six|strong="H8337"\w* per \w row|strong="H4635"\w*—\w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* gold \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w each|strong="H5414"\w* \w row|strong="H4635"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* memorial \w portion|strong="H3899"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* fire \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3117"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* bread \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H6186"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* behalf \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w permanent|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w belongs|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w part|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*—\w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w portion|strong="H2706"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.” Punishment for Blasphemy

\w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H3318"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* mother \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fight|strong="H5327"\w* broke \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w between|strong="H8432"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H3318"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4872"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3482"\w* \w woman|strong="H1323"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="H5344"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w Name|strong="H8034"\w* \w with|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w*. \w So|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H8034"\w* \w brought|strong="H4872"\w* \w him|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*. (\w His|strong="H7043"\w* mother’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Shelomith|strong="H8019"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dibri|strong="H1704"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.)

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w placed|strong="H3240"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w custody|strong="H4929"\w* \w until|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w clear|strong="H6567"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Take|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* blasphemer \f + \fr 24:14 \ft Literally the one who cursed\f* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; \w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3588"\w* \w curses|strong="H7043"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* God, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* consequences \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.

\w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w blasphemes|strong="H5344"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*, whether \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foreign resident \w or|strong="H3068"\w* native; if \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w blasphemes|strong="H5344"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*. An Eye for an Eye (Matthew 5:38–48)

\w And|strong="H4191"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w takes|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w else|strong="H3605"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

Whoever \w kills|strong="H5221"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* animal \w must|strong="H5315"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*—\w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3588"\w* \w injures|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H5997"\w*, whatever \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* must \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w fracture|strong="H7667"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w fracture|strong="H7667"\w*, \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w*.\f + \fr 24:20 \ft Cited in Matthew 5:38\f* Just \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w injured|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* other \w person|strong="H5869"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w same|strong="H3651"\w* must \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w inflicted|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H8478"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Whoever|strong="H4191"\w* \w kills|strong="H5221"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* animal \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*, \w but|strong="H5221"\w* \w whoever|strong="H4191"\w* \w kills|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* same \w standard|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w law|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* foreign resident \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* native; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* blasphemer \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stoned|strong="H7275"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
